scripts.build-legal: npm run clean-legal; cp -r ~/Documents/guld/legal/* docs/; npm run docs; cp -fR _docs/* ~/io/http/guld.legal/; cp css/legal.css ~/io/http/guld.legal/css/legal.css; npm run clean;
scripts.build-info: npm run clean-info; cp -r ~/Documents/guld/legal/* docs/; npm run docs; cp -fR _docs/* ~/io/http/guld.legal/; cp css/legal.css ~/io/http/guld.legal/css/legal.css; npm run clean;
scripts.clean-tech: rm -fR ~/io/http/guld.tech/**/*.html ~/io/http/guld.tech/*.html docs/cli docs/lib docs/papers; npm run clean
scripts.build-tech: npm run clean-tech; cp templates/tech.html docs/template.html; npm run build-tech-lib; npm run build-tech-cli; mkdir docs/papers; cp -r ~/Documents/guld/tech/*.md docs/papers/; mv docs/papers/guld-tech-intro.md docs/index.md; npm run docs; cp -fR _docs/* ~/io/http/guld.tech/; cp css/tech.css ~/io/http/guld.tech/css/tech.css; npm run clean;
scripts.build-tech-cli: mkdir docs/cli; find ../ -maxdepth 1 -type d -name guld-*cli | grep -oh "guld-.*" | while read -r line ; do cp "../$line/README.md" "docs/cli/$line.md" ; done;
scripts.build-tech-lib: mkdir docs/lib; find ../ -maxdepth 1 -type d -name guld-* | grep -v "cli$" | grep -oh "guld-.*" | while read -r line ; do cp "../$line/README.md" "docs/lib/$line.md" ; done; cp ../flexfs/README.md docs/lib/flexfs.md; cp ../gpg-conf/README.md docs/lib/gpg-conf.md; cp ../keyring-gpg/README.md docs/lib/keyring-gpg.md; cp ../keyring-interface/README.md docs/lib/keyring-interface.md; cp ..keyring-pgp/README.md docs/lib/keyring-pgp.md; cp ../keyvaluedb/README.md docs/lib/keyvaluedb.md; cp ../ledger-types/README.md docs/lib/ledger-types.md; rm docs/lib/guld-vrcave.md docs/lib/guld-chat.md docs/lib/guld-chrome.md
